category-def.name: SWTBot SWT Features (incubation)
category-def.label: SWTBot SWT Features (incubation)
category-def.description: This feature contains the basic SWTBot with drivers for SWT. This is useful for testing plain SWT applications.

category-def.name: SWTBot Eclipse Features (incubation)
category-def.label: SWTBot Eclipse Features (incubation)
category-def.description: This feature contains the SWTBot drivers for Eclipse, and some tooling for launching SWTBot tests for eclipse plugins. This is useful for testing Eclipse plugins and applications.
